website_summaries.verdict: It would be easy to dismiss the Samsung PL120's dual-screen feature as a gimmick but it's actually pretty useful for taking self-portraits. If that's not something you tend to do, though, there are better cameras available at a similar price.
pros: Secondary screen useful for composing self-portraits

customer_reviews.title: Great compact camera!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent picture quality. I have had this camera for about 6 years. Yes, there are a few features that take some practice to master the use of, but as with any new electronic device, it helps to read the owners manual prior to using the camera. I'm leaving this review after reading a number of reviews with common complaints that I have seen on other camera reviews. Most tend to be user mistakes that could easily been corected by a little reading.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Emery

customer_reviews.title: feared second hand camera but wow
customer_reviews.text: I had one for years but messed up lens and was blurry-- had extra batteries for it, new cameras were massive cost compared to 6 years ago-- but this used camera has the look of a brand new one, work well with stills and movie on high setting is what I put on you tube for my short films ( donze52) very glad I bought this camera
customer_reviews.author: Tracey D.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is a Joke
customer_reviews.text: I used this camera in my work which amounts to about 2 - 3 hours a day 3 - 4 days/week on weekdays. The camera is always in a case when not in use. Today I was on a job, turned the camera on and noticed the LCD screen was cracked. I chatted with Amazon, who connected me with the manufacturer. I was told the warranty had expired and I would have to pay for repair and shipping! Talk about NO customer service!!!! On a good note, the Amazon Rep provided me with a one-time exception of a full refund. At least Amazon gets it! Kudos to Amazon for doing the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: pmwhite57

customer_reviews.title: Super Camera! VERY GOOD AND FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for beginners and the Price it's pretty good... Good picture quality, good battery life, easy to use and it's nice to have a rechargeable battery built in instead of always changing batteries. and it has a screen on the front that let's you take perfect profile pictures.. I have 2 baby nieces and with the animation feature, you are able to have a little animation video on the front lcd to help draw attention from little kids to the camera. I would certainly recommend this to anyone who wants to buy a new camera. Believe me, you will not regret it. Pros: Bright display, Inexpensive, Lightweight, Realistic color, dual view, multiple features no cons!
customer_reviews.author: Jesler G. Garcia Rojas

customer_reviews.title: What a GREAT camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I am not a professional photographer and lately all my 'prints' are in digital scrapbooks. This camera is extremely easy to use and the LCD in the front is a terrific idea. My wife and I often travel alone and I take pictures of us from an outstretched arm. The front LCD makes it easy to frame the shot. Movies look great on my 55" LCD TV. Another good feature is "smart auto"--no more messing with settings--the camera decides what is best and, so far, it has seldom been wrong. Night shots take a fair amount of time to process but the pictures are wonderful. At $99 this thing is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hiemenz

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Rating based on Amazing Customer Service from this company!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rated this item the other day saying that I was happy with the camera, but I was disappointed because the packaging looked like tape had ripped off portions of the picture on the outer box. Not really a big deal, but since it was a gift so I was disappointed...HOWEVER, I was so pleasantly surprised, that the company actually called me and offered to send a replacement box! They gave me the best customer service I've had in a long time! I can't say enough about how great they were to me. I would definitely make many purchases from this company. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Mc

customer_reviews.title: perfect for just us 2
customer_reviews.text: my hubby and i travel a lot...just us 2, so its hard to get pictures of us together with a great background but the second screen works perfect!!! sometimes pictures get blurry which is sad because the camera features says its blurry free but anyhoo this camera is awesome! you will need to get a memory card because the camera alone only holds 5 pictures! it charges fast and was easy to hook up to the computer! we are still finding new things on this camera...WE LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: KtB

customer_reviews.title: serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: This camera is good. It is simple, like I wanted. The main reason I bought this camera is because it has a front facing screen. It seems that most of my pictures were me with one other person with my arm stretched out taking the picture; so at least now I can make sure it is centered. As far as I know there is no other camera like it available from what I could find. I think it is a great idea and more companies should follow suit. All cell phones have front facing cameras now, why not regular cameras?
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! It takes clear and vivid pictures! The front facing LCD is perfect for taking selfies and getting small children to look at the camera. I took this to Mexico with me and my friends were jealous because this camera took the pretties pictures (aside from those with professional cameras). The only thing I do not like is that battery. It died fairly quickly in comparison to my friends' cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Incredible small, inexpensive camera.
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money ($80, open box) this is an amazing thing. Picture quality is great, and it has enough functions for semi-serious photography. More than I will ever need. The front LCD is one of those things you get used to and wonder how you ever lived without it. In-camera rechargable battery life is excellent. Camera's tiny, but well made, and you don't notice it in a coat pocket. Great travel buddy. The micro-SD cards now are so cheap you can save hours of video for, what, $20?
customer_reviews.author: David Irland

customer_reviews.title: Decent smart camera
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera for roughly a week now and must say it's work very well. I like the features such as the smile & quint detection. Apparently for the smile detection you have to enable the front LCD display & then show your 32 teeth or a "big" smile *L* & it automatically takes ur pic. Cool feature. The only fault(so far) I have is with the back LCD. I smudges easily, i.e. fingerprints are retained even after wiping with a soft cloth. I guess one would have to also get screen protector to prevent the smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt C

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. My earlier Samsung camera didn't have a rechargable battery and used battieries like crazy. This one seldom requires charging and is always ready to go. Takes wonderful photos, is compact and easy to take along. Also great for taking "Selfies" as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not seem to hold a charge but other than that the camera takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Beth  self camera
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife (I am a vanity facilitator) and she takes her picture everywhere and occasionally a picture of me or surroundings. But mostly of herself haha. The dual camera is invaluable. But now she has eyes on my Samsung tablet because it does the same thing only bigger! She would give it 5 stars and I would give it 3 only. It is too petite, and sometimes slow to respond because of the 14MB
customer_reviews.author: TomR

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is worthless Cons: --the pictures are not much better than those taken by cellphone --the menu and the manual look antiquated as for Windows 98 --I cannot connect through cord in Windows 7 or Windows XP and ... --the internal memory and the card are minuscule-I only can get very few photos on it --the seller (Blink) sent me to Canada via DHL even if it was specified regular mail. Pros: -it is light
customer_reviews.author: East guy

customer_reviews.title: good but
customer_reviews.text: Think is a perfect cam and have tons of features for the price but at the same time it can be a problem for an "average user", I mean is not so hard to use it but if you need a good pic fast in a specific condition can be a trouble to find what are you looking for...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Valverde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift under $100
customer_reviews.text: At the time of my purchase, this item was going for less than $100. Amazing Christmas gift. Bought it for my sister and she loved it. It has facial recognition, as well as the "smile" function that many cameras nowadays have. (you smile and it snaps a pic once it has detected a the "gesture"). It's not heavy and it's pocket size. It does, however, feel a bit fragile, but it actually isn't!! Lol... I know that may be hard to comprehend, but if you buy it, you'll know what I mean...
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price !!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice front LCD which I initially though they sent me the wrong item as you almost cannot see the LCD when the camera is off. It blends so nicely with black body. Picture quality leaves a lot to desire but for the price, no complaint. Thank you SAMSUNG

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't used the camera,it was a gift for our granddaughter. She loves it and has been using it a lot. She says the pictures turn out really good. Also fits nicely in her back pack. What I noticed was that the camera was small enough to fit in any pocket, which I like. The price was good and delivery of camera was quick.

customer_reviews.text: Seller was good. Bought it as used, arrived looking new. Camera? Lousy! Tinkered with the settings and still blurry pictures after dark. Took it to a restaurant with friends, Mistake! Embarrassing! Lousy pictures. I dont recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: i like it but the front screen picture feature is not as cool without the proper image stabilization. so it became a bit frustrating to use it. you are far better off getting a smart phone with 8 megapixel camera with dual view because it will be a FAR better investment.

customer_reviews.title: I loved this camera the first time I bought it but the second not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when I first got it for prom. All of the pictures come out beautifully and the front view helped but I had to buy again because it was stolen. The second time around the camera stopped working out of nowhere the screen just went white. I know I didn't drop it or get water in it because I am very careful about my electronics. Highly disappointing didn't even go through the trouble of getting a refund

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the price but there are two things i would recommend if you are using this camera with a Desktop then your going to need a longer USB cord the one that comes with it is VERY short and is made for people who will use this camera with a laptop this cord works perfect [...] Also you should pick up a micro SD card too the memory thats built in the camera is pretty small like i said GREAT camera

And I really like the control you get with this camera. From shutter rates to ISO control, filter choices and modes. Its menu is really easy to navigate. And its a very small and light camera. Definitely worth the 100 bucks

customer_reviews.text: Be detailed and specific. What would you have wanted to know before you purchased the product? Not too short and not too long. Aim for between 75 and 300 words.

product_meta.title: Samsung EC-PL120 Digital Camera with 14.2 MP and 5x Optical Zoom (Black)
product_meta.description:
The Samsung PL120 DualView 14.2-Megapixel Digital Camera features LCD viewfinders on both the front and rear of the camera, making it easy for you to take great self-portraits as well as set up your other shots clearly. Thanks to HD Movie, you can also use the PL120 to shoot high-definition video. Digital image stabilization creates clear, blur-free photos, while Smart Auto 2.0 optimizes settings for pictures and video in any lighting.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Samsung PL120 DualView 14.2-Megapixel Digital Camera features LCD viewfinders on both the front and rear of the camera, making it easy for you to take great self-portraits as well as set up your other shots clearly. Thanks to HD Movie, you can also use the PL120 to shoot high-definition video. Digital image stabilization creates clear, blur-free photos, while Smart Auto 2.0 optimizes settings for pictures and video in any lighting. 



PL120 DualView Digital Camera (Black)
At a Glance: * 14.2-megapixel digital camera and 5x optical zoom for high-quality images
 * 1.5-inch front LCD screen lets you take great self-portraits
 * Shoots high-definition video in 1,280-by-720-pixel resolution
 * Digital image stabilization creates clear, blur-free photos and video
 * Smart Auto feature analyzes composition elements to create the perfect shot
 * One-year limited warranty on parts and labor


Features LCD viewfinders on front and back of camera for perfectly framed shots. View larger.
Beauty Shot feature automatically removes imperfections for flawless portraits. View larger.Digital Image Stabilization for Sharp Images and Video
Make sure the only motion in your videos is intentional. Digital image stabilization automatically compensates for unwanted camcorder movement by realigning each electronic image, frame by frame, with steady results. The Samsung PL120 allows you to record movies in the palm of your hand. With HD Movie, you can capture video in 1,280-by-720-pixel resolution at 30 frames per second. 

Front and Back LCD Viewfinders
With the PL120, it's easier than ever to put yourself in the shot. In addition to the 2.7-inch viewfinder on the rear of the camera, there is an additional 1.5-inch LCD screen on front. This allows you to quickly line up self-portraits or join a friend or loved one for a perfectly-framed two-person photo. 

Smart Auto 2.0 Creates the Perfect Shot
Using Smart Auto 2.0, the Samsung PL120 captures the perfect shot by analyzing key composition elements and selecting from 17 different photo and 4 different movie modes. 

Using its face/smile/blink-detection feature, the Samsung PL120 detects and adjusts the lighting on up to nine different faces at a time. The camera will automatically shoot the subjects when they laugh or smile, and prohibit the shot from happening if anyone's eyes are closed. 

Advanced Effects for Your Photos with Smart Filter
The Samsung PL120 offers Smart Filter, a collection of lens effects that give your still shots an artistic edge. They include a miniature filter, which miniaturizes everything in your picture; a vignetting filter, which delivers a striking compositional contrast; and a fish-eye filter, which zooms in to give your subject a cool, distorted look. 

The camera's Beauty Shot feature automatically removes dark circles, facial blemishes, and imperfections to create great portraits. It's like having a makeup artist in your camera. A 1.5-inch front LCD screen makes it even easier to take great self-portraits. 

Product and Warranty Information
The Samsung PL120 is equipped with a 26mm Samsung lens, a 5x optical zoom, a 2.7-inch LCD screen, and a 1.5-inch front LCD screen. The camera measures 2.15 by 3.7 by 0.74 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.24 pounds. 

The Samsung PL120 is backed by a one-year limited warranty on parts and labor. 

What's in the Box
Camera, AC adapter/USB cable, rechargeable battery, wrist strap, user manual CD-ROM, and quick start manual.
